resource_section: Registration with the SLBFE by Gender 2019-2023
remarks: Dataset contains SLBFE (Sri Lanka Bureau of Foreign Employment) registration statistics by gender for 2023, showing the distribution of registered workers by gender. Columns: Year, Male (Number), Male (%), Female (Number), Female (%), and Total. Data shows that in 2023, there were 164,608 male registrations (55.30%) and 133,048 female registrations (44.70%), totaling 297,656 workers. This indicates a slight male majority in foreign employment registrations.
